column4: which windows emulator is most successful at running windows games?
is there an ubuntu wine package?
i'm planning on getting my family to run ubuntu and if i can get my mom's games going, its downhill from there
Wine is under rapid development, so you migh want to not restrict yourself to the version offered by Feisty: "deb http://wine.budgetdedicated.com/apt/ feisty main"
